posts.post_content: i don't get why this is rated so low. if anyone actually used this then they wouldn't rate it a 1/5. This combos with things like triskelion, any arcbound card, any clockwork card, pentavus, and Joraga warcaller. Also the fact that it's instant means that you can surprise your opponent and usually take out a good creature of theirs.

posts.post_content:
Ahem. First of all it does remove -1/-1 counters, there was a rules change when Shadowmor came out.  
Second, I don't know why he was talking about [force of will](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=force of will), that really is a random comment.  
Lastly reinforce is an ability of Morningtide where you can discard certain cards to put a given amount of +1/+1 counters on a creature, which is like this card but as an ability (which is harder to counter)  
  
Make sure you are right before you put your foot in your mouth.
posts.html:
